QuestData.Title: Picking Up the Pieces
QuestData.Description: With the spirits of the murdered craftsmen and shaman at rest, the way is clear for us to complete the ceremonies interrupted by the attack. You must perform a role traditionally reserved for a tuskarr shaman, and you must possess all the necessary ritual items.$B$BThere is no time to craft new ones, so you will need to scour the quarry for those left by the victims of the attack. Handle these objects with care, $n, for some are centuries old. You may need to wrest them from the hands of the invaders.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 6 Tuskarr Ritual Objects to Elder Atkanok, who stands outside Coldrock Quarry.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you recovered a full set of ritual items?
QuestData.RewardText: <You hold the objects before the statue of Elder Atkanok.>$B$BThose will suffice, although they are in a sad state. Some of them have survived centuries of use, only to be battered and stolen by barbarians.
